justification: Trade sends injured Tier 5 Lucas Allen for B’s healthy Tier 1 Trevor Rodriguez. B urgently needs reliable production and prefers consistent possession types; Allen is out and not steady. The proposal misreads B’s priorities and overestimates acceptance (0.68). Rationale is generic and inaccurate, conflating ‘steady vet’ with an injured, declining player. Overall ToM and coherence are poor.
